front.title: Transport Mappings for Real-time Application Quality of Service Monitoring (RAQMON) Protocol Data Unit (PDU)

abstract.t: This memo specifies two transport mappings of the Real-time Application Quality of Service Monitoring (RAQMON) information model defined in [RAQMON-FRAMEWORK] using TCP as a native transport and the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) to carry the RAQMON information from a RAQMON Data Source (RDS) to a RAQMON Report Collector (RRC).
